llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-cartservice-access
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7070
EOF
output: Error from server (NotFound): namespaces "frontend" not found
